Latest Figures.The latest figure of unemployment available is that for the 22nd April, 1929, giving a total number on the registers for Great Britain of 1,140,700. This is an increase over the position on the 25th March, 1929, amounting to 7,844, and an increase over a year ago of 78,415.ARTHUR STBEL-MAITLAND.Ministry of Labour,May 3, 1929.
